basics.name: Pratik Kamble
basics.label: Sr Software Engineer
basics.summary: With over 10 years in software development, I specialize in cloud-native solutions and microservices, utilizing GoLang, GCP, Docker and Terraform. Proven expertise in designing and implementing scalable,high performance systems. Passionate about leveraging cloud technologies and edge computing to drive innovation and efficiency. Committed to continuous learning and applying best practices to deliver robust, cutting-edge solutions. Seeking to contribute my skills and experience to dynamic projects in cloud-native architecture.

work.name: Pantheon Platform
work.summary: Pantheon Front-End Sites provide users with tools that improve the experience of building a decoupled frontend that sources data from a CMS backend. Front-End Sites allows a CMS site to be linked to a single site, multiple sites, or you can link directly to a frontend application without a CMS. Check more info here: https://docs.pantheon.io/guides/decoupled/overview
highlights: Improved website performance by optimizing code
responsibilities: Designed and implemented microservices utilizing GraphQL to efficiently handle metadata for customer websites and website operations.
Engineered a microservice for seamless integration with GitHub, facilitating event management.
Employed Terraform (Infrastructure as Code) to orchestrate internal infrastructure and streamline customer resource provisioning
Crafted an edge service utilizing Fastly C@E to intelligently route requests to various backends.
Established robust CI/CD pipelines for both services and libraries to ensure continuous integration and delivery.
Implemented comprehensive health checks for microservices to enhance overall system reliability and performance.
achievements: Developing and maintaining web applications using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Collaborating with the team to implement new features and fix bugs.

work.name: QED42 Engineering pvt ltd
work.summary: Assisting in the development and maintenance of software applications using Python and Django. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure quality and timely delivery of software solutions.
highlights: Contributed to a major project that streamlined internal workflows, improving efficiency by 30%
responsibilities: Timely delivery of performance-optimized business solutions.
Developing site-level architecture
Custom module and theme development for Drupal 7 and Drupal 8
Mentoring fellow developers in projects and open source contributions
Participation in sprint planning, ticket grooming, implementation detail addition, PR reviews, and client demos
Conducting Performance and Security audits
Providing training and onboarding resources
Drupal 7 to Drupal 8 migration tasks
achievements: Successfully implemented a feature that enhanced user authentication, improving security measures.
